net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player

类 PlayerDropsEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.fml.common.eventhandler.Event
      • net.minecraftforge.event.entity.EntityEvent
        • net.minecraftforge.event.entity.living.LivingEvent
          • net.minecraftforge.event.entity.living.LivingDropsEvent
            • net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player.PlayerDropsEvent

  • public class PlayerDropsEvent
extends LivingDropsEvent
    Child class of LivingDropEvent that is fired specifically when a player dies. Canceling the event will prevent ALL drops from entering the world.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 net.minecraftforge.event.entity.living.LivingEvent

        LivingEvent.LivingJumpEvent, LivingEvent.LivingUpdateEvent

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 net.minecraftforge.event.entity.EntityEvent

        EntityEvent.CanUpdate, EntityEvent.EnteringChunk, EntityEvent.EntityConstructing

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 net.minecraftforge.fml.common.eventhandler.Event

        Event.HasResult, Event.Result

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      PlayerDropsEvent(EntityPlayer entity, DamageSource source, java.util.List<EntityItem> drops, boolean recentlyHit)
      Creates a new event containing all the items that will drop into the world when a player dies.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • PlayerDropsEvent

        public PlayerDropsEvent(EntityPlayer entity,
                        DamageSource source,
                        java.util.List<EntityItem> drops,
                        boolean recentlyHit)
        Creates a new event containing all the items that will drop into the world when a player dies.
        参数:
        entity - The dying player.
        source - The source of the damage which is killing the player.
        drops - List of all drops entering the world.
